meta.description: The Li family plans to invest in commercial real estate properties to maximize their annual income within a budget constraint.

sets.name: PROPERTIES
sets.description: Set of properties available for investment.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of each property in millions.

params.name: budget
params.description: Total budget available for investment in millions.

vars.name: buy
vars.description: Binary decision variable indicating whether to buy a property.

objective.name: max_total_income
objective.description: Maximize the total annual income from purchased properties.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total cost of purchased properties must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: mutual_exclusivity_3_4
constraints.description: Cannot purchase both Property 3 and Property 4.
